text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS @ICEgov So he's good at deporting people and ignoring racism in America, we got that. Could he start acting like people are dying daily from coronavirus? He's so determined to keep racist flags and statues safe from "the left" but he don't give a damn about how many have died smdh😒
